Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Vernon
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are rerouted in both directions via 79th, King Drive, 76th, Cottage Grove, and 79th, due to police activity near 79th/Vernon.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, King Drive, 76th, Cottage Grove, and 79th, then resume their normal route, due to police activity near 79th/Vernon. 

Allow extra travel time.
